name: individualistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to one particular person rather than a group or society, or relating to someone who is different or original: Contemporary art is highly individualistic. Her approach is highly individualistic and may not be suitable for everyone. See
individualism
More examplesFewer examplesThey were an odd band of individualistic, loner photographers. Individualistic cultures are especially conducive to entrepreneurship.Gymnastics is one of the most individualistic and difficult sports.
